metadata.source: X12 / Washington Publishing Company (WPC) - RARC list
metadata.note: Curated subset of common RARC codes seen in denial remittances. Full list at wpc-edi.com.

MA01.description: If you do not agree with what we approved for these services, you may appeal our decision.
MA01.action_hint: Review denial notice for appeal deadlines and required documentation.

MA04.description: Secondary payment cannot be considered without the identity of or payment information from the primary payer.
MA04.action_hint: Submit primary payer EOB and payment details.

MA07.description: The claim information has also been forwarded to Medicaid for review.
MA07.action_hint: Monitor Medicaid review status before resubmission.

MA13.description: You may be subject to penalties if you bill the patient for amounts not reported with the PR group code.
MA13.action_hint: Ensure patient billing complies with PR group code and payer rules.

MA18.description: The claim information is also being forwarded to the patient's supplemental insurer.
MA18.action_hint: Wait for supplemental insurer processing before rebilling.

MA130.description: Your claim contains incomplete and/or invalid information, and no appeal rights are afforded because the claim is unprocessable.
MA130.action_hint: Correct missing or invalid claim data and resubmit a new claim.

N30.description: Patient not eligible for this payer's coverage on the date of service.
N30.action_hint: Verify patient coverage dates and update insurance information.

N56.description: Procedure code billed is not correct/valid for the services billed or the date of service billed.
N56.action_hint: Verify CPT/HCPCS code accuracy and correct billing date.

N95.description: This provider type/provider specialty may not bill this service.
N95.action_hint: Confirm provider specialty billing rules or bill under eligible provider.

N115.description: This decision was based on a Local Coverage Determination (LCD).
N115.action_hint: Review applicable LCD criteria and submit supporting documentation.

N386.description: This decision was based on a Local Coverage Determination (LCD). An Advance Beneficiary Notice (ABN) was not on file.
N386.action_hint: Confirm ABN requirements and provide documentation if applicable.

N579.description: The services are not covered because they are not considered medically reasonable and necessary under the payer's guidelines.
N579.action_hint: Submit clinical documentation supporting medical necessity.

N657.description: This claim has been identified as a readmission.
N657.action_hint: Provide documentation supporting medical necessity of readmission.

N362.description: The number of days or units of service exceeds our acceptable maximum.
N362.action_hint: Verify benefit limits and provide medical justification for excess units.

N432.description: Adjustment based on the contractual agreement between payer and provider.
N432.action_hint: Review payer contract terms to verify allowable amounts.

N519.action_hint: Verify required modifiers and resubmit corrected claim.

N522.description: Duplicate of a claim processed, or to be processed, as a crossover claim.
N522.action_hint: Verify claim status before resubmitting to avoid duplicate billing.

N650.description: This is a payer-initiated adjustment to ensure correct payment.
N650.action_hint: Review payment adjustment details on the ERA/EOB.
